summary: Diff adds a new GoalsDashboard page and wiring in App/main, plus Lora font loading. However, key UI/behavior requirements (title rendering, exact 7-card row layout/no-wrap + conditional scrolling, dashed dividers, checkbox toggling behavior, and the end-of-row button) are not verifiable from the provided truncated code excerpt. Additionally, the diff introduces Internet Identity / actor plumbing that was explicitly listed as a non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Dashboard page titled "My Goals : 2026" with exactly 7 vertical goal cards in the specified order and color families, matching the reference layout.
missing_requirements.reason: GoalsDashboard.tsx is truncated before any JSX/layout is shown; the diff excerpt only shows data definitions, so the title text, exact 7-card render order in the UI, and reference-like layout cannot be confirmed from available evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply Lora italic to all card titles and all goal text across the dashboard.
missing_requirements.reason: Lora is imported and a utility class is defined, but the diff excerpt does not show the class applied to titles/goals in JSX.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render goals in each card with dashed separator lines between consecutive goal items.
missing_requirements.reason: No JSX/CSS for dashed dividers between items is visible in the provided truncated GoalsDashboard.tsx excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Interactive goal items with checkbox control that toggles completed state immediately in UI, with completed vs incomplete visually distinguishable.
missing_requirements.reason: Checkbox component is imported and local state is suggested, but the diff excerpt does not show the checkbox controls rendered, the toggle handler, or completed styling.

missing_requirements.requirement: Single-row no-wrap behavior; horizontal scrolling disabled for 7 or fewer cards and enabled only when more than 7 cards.
missing_requirements.reason: No container layout styles/logic are shown in the truncated excerpt to confirm no-wrapping and the conditional overflow behavior based on card count.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a button labeled "See goals per month" at the end (right side) of the card row.
missing_requirements.reason: Button is imported but the diff excerpt does not show it rendered with the exact required label after the last card.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hooks added (InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity) and wrapped around the app.
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication/Internet Identity integration is explicitly listed as a non-goal; no requirement requested adding II context/provider.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor creation/query plumbing (useActor) with react-query, including identity-based actor recreation and query invalidation.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements asked for backend actors or identity-dependent actor management; backend persistence was a non-goal unless requested later.
